features: Clarifying Toner: This astringent/toner is formulated to protect and beautify acne prone skin, helping remove surface impurities without stripping the skin while hydrating and refreshing

Rejuvenating Formula: With Licorice Root Extract to help even skin tone, antioxidant-rich Vitamin C to help support rejuvenation and add glow to skin, plus Apple Cider Vinegar which removes oil, minimizes pores and helps balance pH

The Ambi Regimen: We make dermatologist-recommended products to cleanse, moisturize and nourish, help fade dark spots and discoloration, treat acne, and even skin tone, and other solutions for melanin-rich skin

Your Skincare Journey: For smooth, even-toned, flawless looking skin try our cleansers, bar soaps, serums, moisturizers and fade creams specifically formulated for and by those with diverse skin tones
The Skin Tone Authority: For 50 years, Ambi has been rooted in catering to the skincare needs of women of color, blending science and nature to create affordable, high-quality skincare products
body.description: Ambi Even & Clear Intense Clarifying Toner is a dual-purpose item: a Clarifying Toner (which removes surface impurities without stripping the skin) and a Facial Mist (which hydrates and refreshes the skin). It is specifically formulated with Licorice Root Extract which helps even skin tone and antioxidant-rich Vitamin C which helps support skin rejuvenation and adds glow to skin. It also includes Apple Cider Vinegar which removes oil, minimizes, pores and helps balance skin's pH.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quantity.And I love the smell.
reviews.reviewText: I like that I can spray my face with it. I love this smell of it. I did not like the fact that some of it had leaked out and the cap was off of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This toner has transformed my skin so much. It feels moisturizing especially since I have dry skin. I get fewer breakouts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was given this product as a joke gift for my 60th Bday The joke is on them ! I have have fallen in love with this amazing product which I would have never thought to buy or use on my own I spray it on before I shave and also at the end of the day ! I have notice and so have others that my skin and complexion look great ! I won't be with this now ! I ordered a few bottles and so should you The price and value is fantastic Oh I also got the fade cream as part of a gag gift which I now also use every day ! thanks Christine !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's seems to be good
reviews.reviewText: This is m first trying this Ambi product and so far so good. I only use it in the mornings and the smell does not bother me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it
reviews.reviewText: I like that it makes your face look so smooth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It feels sticky
reviews.reviewText: It feels sticky after use. My skin doesn’t feel clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Tiene buen aroma, espero y funcione bien en mi piel
